contentList:
Dark Cleric Embrace the shadows with the Dark Cleric, a fallen beacon of celestial grace turned to darker powers. Wield necrotic energies, unleash auras of dread, and dominate the battlefield with dark, devastating spells. Dark Power This resource represents the dark power you wield, growing stronger as you embrace the shadows.
Dark Resilience (Necrotic) Your resistance to necrotic damage is enhanced, and you gain immunity to the frightened condition. Permanent +2 Strength Your Strength is permanently increased by 2. Dark Fortitude (Increase HP) Increase your maximum HP by 3. Dark Fortitude Unleashed Increase your maximum HP by 2. Shadow Veil You gain advantage on Stealth checks when in dim light, allowing you to blend into the shadows more effectively. Corruption Aura Damage You emit an aura of necrotic energy that deals 3d8 necrotic damage to enemies within a radius at the start of their turn. Unholy Conduit Your spells that deal necrotic damage are increased in potency, dealing an additional 2d8 necrotic damage to your foes.
Dark Mending Whenever you cast a spell that restores HP, you regain additional HP equal to 1d6. Soul Drain When you hit a creature with a spell, you regain 5% of the spell’s damage as health. Corruption Aura You emit an aura of necrotic energy that deals damage to enemies within a radius at the start of their turn.
/ Spells/ Necrotic Bolt A bolt of necrotic energy that deals damage and inflicts a status that reduces the target's healing received. Necrotic Surge Unleash a surge of necrotic energy that damages all enemies in a wide area, and applies a status that makes them fearful. Soul Rend Rend the soul of your target with a powerful necrotic ray, dealing significant damage and applying a status that paralyzes them. Unholy Blessing Bestow dark blessings upon your allies, enhancing their abilities and providing them with increased resistance to necrotic damage. Eternal Night Envelops the area in magical darkness and blinds enemies within it, creating an aura of terror. Gravebind Conjures binding necrotic energy that snares enemies, inflicting damage and holding them in place. Shadowfury Unleash a devastating wave of dark energy, causing intense necrotic damage and instilling fear in all affected enemies. Necrotic Surge Unleash a surge of necrotic energy that deals substantial damage and drains the target’s life force, weakening them and restoring some vitality to you. Dark Eclipse At Level 12, you unleash a powerful burst of necrotic energy, creating a cloud that deals significant necrotic damage to enemies within its radius and causes them to become frightened. The cloud obscures vision and lingers for a short duration, enhancing your control over the battlefield.
Necrotic Wound This wound festers with necrotic energy, dealing damage over time. Heal on Spell Hit You heal for 5% of the damage dealt when you hit a target with a spell.
/ Status / Corruption Aura Damage Received The character has recently taken damage from the Corruption Aura and will not take additional damage from it for a short period.
